hero.subtitle: Aurora MBTI / AI-Powered Personality Analysis
hero.title: Discover Your
hero.description: Gain deep insights into your personality traits, strengths, and growth opportunities through AI-driven intelligent analysis.

methodology.label: 01 / Four-Dimensional Personality Theory
methodology.title: 16 Personality Types
methodology.description: Based on Jungian psychology theory with four pairs of dimensions‚ÄîNi-Se, Ne-Si, Ti-Fe, Te-Fi‚Äîderiving 16 distinct personality types from INTJ to ESFP.

technology.label: 02 / AI Analysis
technology.title: Deep Insights
technology.description: Through advanced AI technology, we provide personalized career advice, interpersonal insights, and personal growth directions.

scientific.title: Scientifically Rigorous
scientific.description: Based on Jungian psychology and psychometric principles.

personalized.title: Personalized Experience
personalized.description: Customized analysis based on your background information.

intelligent.title: Intelligent Insights
intelligent.description: Combining AI technology to generate deep personality insights.

cta.title: Ready to Discover Your True Self?
cta.description: 5,420+ users have discovered their unique strengths through Aurora MBTI.

hero.label: Step 01 / Personal Profile
hero.title: Tell Us
hero.description: We'll use this information to personalize your AI analysis and provide more accurate personality assessments and recommendations.

preferences.label: 02 / Personal Preferences
preferences.title: Understand Your Style
preferences.interestsPlaceholder: Describe your interests, e.g., programming, reading, travel (optional)

privacy.title: Your Privacy Matters
privacy.description: We only use your information to improve your analysis experience and will not share it with third parties.
privacy.localStorage: All data is stored locally in your browser. We do not upload or save any of your personal information.
privacy.sensitiveInfo: Sensitive information includes: name, age, gender, occupation, education, relationship status, and other personal data.
privacy.control: You can clear locally stored data at any time, giving you complete control over your personal information.

hero.label: 01 / Select Test Mode
hero.title: Customize
hero.description: Hello {name}, please select the test mode that suits you. AI will generate personalized questions based on your profile.

generating.title: AI Question Generation
generating.description: Analyzing potential personality dimensions based on your personal profile...

ai30.title: AI Quick Mode
ai30.description: Core questions generated by AI for quick personality profiling.

ai60.title: AI Deep Mode
ai60.description: Balanced speed and precision, AI delves deep into your profession and background.

ai120.title: AI Ultimate Mode
ai120.description: Most comprehensive AI analysis with extremely high precision dimension assessment.

actions.note: AI will take approximately 1-2 minutes to generate personalized questions

prompt.title: Add Some Details?
prompt.description: AI would like to learn more about you to generate more precise questions. This will only take 1 minute.

form.title: AI Follow-up
form.description: Please briefly answer the following questions for a more accurate profile.

resetConfirm.title: Reset Progress
resetConfirm.description: Are you sure you want to reset the current test progress? All answered questions will be lost.

guidelines.label: // GUIDELINES
guidelines.text:
Please answer based on your first reaction; there are no right or wrong answers.
Stay honest, as this will help you get the most accurate MBTI personality profile.

repeat.title: Repeated Selection Detected
repeat.description: You have selected the same answer for 5 consecutive questions. Please ensure you are answering based on your true thoughts, not just to finish quickly.

quickFill.title: Quick Fill Neutral Options?
quickFill.description: Are you sure you want to fill all remaining questions with 'Neutral'? This will significantly reduce the accuracy of the results.

reset.title: Reset Test
reset.description: Are you sure you want to reset all current progress?

regenerateDialog.title: Regenerate Analysis
regenerateDialog.description: About to regenerate your personality analysis using the latest AI model. This will overwrite the previous analysis results.

hero.label: 01 / Test History
hero.title: Your Journey
hero.description: View all your past MBTI test results, compare your personality changes, and track your growth.

empty.title: No Test Records Yet
empty.description: Start your first MBTI personality test and record your journey of discovery.

cta.title: Continue Exploring Your Personality
cta.description: Every test is an opportunity for self-awareness

clearConfirm.title: Clear History
clearConfirm.description: This will delete all test records. This action cannot be undone.

hero.label: 01 / Personality Type Library
hero.description: Deep dive into the core characteristics, strengths, and representative figures of each personality type. Explore the diversity of human behavior.

nt.title: Rationals
nt.description: Strategic, curious, value objectivity and logic. They are natural thinkers and leaders.

nf.title: Idealists
nf.description: Compassionate, seek meaning, value personal growth. They are profound insights and inspiring individuals.

sj.title: Guardians
sj.description: Practical, stable, value order and tradition. They are the foundation of society, reliable executors.

sp.title: Explorers
sp.description: Flexible, spontaneous, value sensory experiences. They are action-oriented, good at handling emergencies and enjoying life.

cta.title: Ready to Discover
cta.description: Get your own personalized analysis through AI-driven in-depth testing.

hero.label: 01 / Behind the Scenes
hero.title: Acknowledgments
hero.description: This site was collaboratively created by the following AI teachers. From architectural logic to visual aesthetics, every line of code and pixel embodies their wisdom. We express our sincerest gratitude here.
hero.credit: This page was created by Gemini 3.0 Flash Teacher

contributions.label: 02 / Teaching and Guidance
contributions.title: Wisdom of AI Mentors
contributions.description: Grateful for the guidance and contributions of various AI teachers at different stages, turning this site from a concept into reality.

initial.title: Initial Project Framework
initial.description: The initial pages and basic skeleton of the project were inspired and supported by v0's generation capabilities.

mvp.title: MVP Models
mvp.description: The most outstanding top models (Most Valuable Players), jointly honored by GPT 5.2 Codex, Claude 4.5 Opus, and Gemini 3 Pro.

core.title: Core Module Design
core.description: Core modules and key interaction solutions mainly come from Claude 4 Sonnet in Windsurf.

ui.title: UI Design
ui.description: Overall UI visuals and layout optimization come from suggestions and iterations by Gemini 3 Flash and Gemini 3 Pro.

refactor.title: Project Late-Stage Refactoring
refactor.description: Late-stage structure organization and refactoring were completed jointly by Codex CLI, Claude Code, and Claude 4.5 series and GPT 5.2 Codex in Cursor.

matrix.label: 03 / Complete List

matrix.quote: The boundaries of tools are the boundaries of thought. We eliminate boundaries here.
